name: Pumpkin Basketball
description:
Toss, smash and explode pumpkins like basket balls in Pumpkin Basketball. A Halloween game by Spooky House Studios.

This is an Augmented Reality (AR) game.

Adjust difficulty just by moving the bin around your own environment.

Features:
- Funny and slick animations
- Spooky Effects
- 12 Different pumpkins
- Ultra realistic graphics
- Play in your own environment thanks to AR Kit Augmented Reality technology
- Easy to learn, intuitive controls
- 3 difficulty levels to compete
- Global and local real time live leaderboards
- Beautfiul graphics
- Multiple bins to choose from ( one included for free )
- Daily coins bonuses

Download Pumpkin Basketball now!
